title: Rachael
body:
<<if visited ("Rachael") is false>>
Hello detective. Can I help you?
->Sorry to interupt your scheldule Ms. Baxter. I have some questions for you.
    That's alright.
->Yes, I have some questions for you.
    Well make it quick, I'm a busy woman.
What is this about?
->Last night Jacob Wright was killed. I'm investigating.
    *sigh* I knew he'd get himself in trouble eventually.
->I'm investigating a murder last night.
    You mean Jacob, don't you?
    ->Yes.
        *sigh* I knew he'd get himself into trouble over this.
    ->No
        Oh good. What can I do to help?
    ->I can't comment on an ongoing investigation. Sorry.
        That answers my question. 
    ->What makes you ask that?
        It's obvious isn't it? After the announcement someone was bound to be angry.
<<else>>
Yes?
<<endif>>
[[What were your movements last night?|Rachael.LastNight]]
[[What can you tell me about Jacob's announcement?|Rachael.Jacob]]
[[Just a moment, let me consult my notes|Rachael.Exit]]

title: Rachael.LastNight
body:
Let's see. I finished work here at 5:00. Ask my staff.
From there, I went to my favourite bar for a drink.
I left there at around 8, and went home.
->Do you have anyone who can back that up?
    My staff and the bartender at BARNAME.
    ->Thanks.
        Anything else?
    ->Can anyone vouch for you at home?
        I live on my own, so no.
->Thanks. I'll add that to my notes
I'm not a suspect am I?
->Everyone is a suspect at this stage.
->I'm just following all the leads.
I see.
[[What can you tell me about Jacob's announcement?|Rachael.Jacob]]
[[Just a moment, let me consult my notes|Rachael.Exit]]

title: Rachael.Jacob
body:
Well, I suppose most people don't know what we do here.
->Give me details.
    Our company produces microprocessors. Very high quality technology.
    Currently we make a lot of components for the military.
    Things like stabilizers on Tanks, or targeting systems for missiles.
->Just cliff-notes if you don't mind.
    Okay then. Short of it is we make military hardware.

Recently Jacob had a change of heart about our business.
He decided that if we want to be an ethical company, we need to stop feeding war with our technology.
Needless to say, this didn't go down especially well with the shareholders.

I tried to talk him out of it, but he's stubborn. Convinced his way is the only way.

[[What were your movements last night?|Rachael.LastNight]]
[[Just a moment, let me consult my notes|Rachael.Exit]]

title: Rachael.Exit
body: Okay. I'll just get back to my emails.
